```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```

```{r}
library(wehoop) #library to draw boxscores from
library(dplyr)

# Fetch player box score traditional for 2025 regular season
player_box_trad_2025 <- load_wnba_player_box(seasons = 2003:2025)

# Filter for only players that played in the game and logged at least a minute
wnba = player_box_trad_2025 %>%
  filter(did_not_play == FALSE, minutes != 0) %>%
  select(1:7, 12:32, 46:48, 57) %>% #Select only columns that aid statistical analysis
  group_by(athlete_display_name) %>% 
  filter(n()>50) %>% #Only players with more than 50 games played
  ungroup()


wnba

write.csv(wnba, file = "wnba_player_data")
```
